tool_name: IP Geolocation Find IP Location and IP Info
tool_description: IP Geolocation API allows developers to get geolocation information for a given IP address. Data points returned by this GeoIP API include city, state, province, country, continent, latitude, longitude, region, timezone, current time, organization, ISP, local currency, and country flags.

api_list.name: Get IP Geolocation
api_list.description: This endpoint returns geolocation and other useful points from an IP Address. If the IP address is provided as a query parameter, geolocation is performed on that IP address. If the IP address is left empty, geolocation data of the client IP is returned.
